#summary CTE XL Professional, a test design tool.

= CTE XL Professional=

||  || [http://www.cte-xl-professional.com/ download] ||


CTE XL Professional is a test design tool (not only) for combinatorial testing.

CTE XL Professional is a commercial tool. Free evaluation licenses and free licenses for Academia are available upon request. 

A [http://www.berner-mattner.com/en/berner-mattner-home/products/cte/cte-xl/index.html complete free edition] is available, however, with a reduced set of features.
